scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u helpers -n media_plan -o build/media_plan.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/helpers.js -c -m -o build/media_plan.min.js && rm -f build/media_plan.zip && zip -j build/media_plan.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/media_plan.js build/media_plan.min.js
